description.zh-cn: 一种社会阶层制度，其特点是通过内婚制、继承的方式传承某一特定阶层的生活方式。
description.en: A form of social stratification characterized by endogamy, hereditary transmission of a style of life which often includes an occupation, ritual status in a hierarchy, and customary social interaction and exclusion.

description.zh-cn: 印度及其他南亚地区普遍存在的社会分层体系。
description.en: A system of social stratification prevalent in India and other parts of South Asia.

description.zh-cn: 印度种姓制度中的一种社会组别，基于出身。
description.en: A social group based on birth within the Indian caste system.

description.zh-cn: 印度教文献中提出的一种理论社会阶级制度，将社会构想为由四个阶层组成的结构。
description.en: A theoretical social class system in Hindu literature that conceives society as structured into four classes.

description.zh-cn: 与印度种姓制度相似的尼泊尔社会分层体系。
description.en: A system of social stratification in Nepal, similar to the caste system in India.

description.zh-cn: 尼泊尔国王，曾在其统治期间将尼瓦尔人分为64个种姓。
description.en: A king of Nepal who divided the Newar people into 64 castes during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 尼泊尔国王，曾在其统治期间推行类似种姓的社会制度。
description.en: A king of Nepal who implemented a caste-like social system during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 廓尔喀国王，曾在其统治期间设立印度的社会制度。
description.en: King of Gorkha who established the Indian social system during his reign.

description.zh-cn: 尼泊尔首相，其出任后尼泊尔正式成为印度教王国，巩固了种姓制度。
description.en: Prime Minister of Nepal, under whom Nepal officially became a Hindu kingdom, strengthening the caste system.

description.zh-cn: 世界主要宗教之一。
description.en: One of the world's major religions.

description.zh-cn: 斯里兰卡的社会分层系统，受到印度迦提系统和瓦尔那理论的影响。
description.en: A system of social stratification in Sri Lanka, influenced by the Indian Jati system and Varna theory.

description.zh-cn: 世界主要宗教之一。
description.en: One of the world's major religions.

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚巴厘岛历史上存在的种姓制度。
description.en: The historical caste system existing in Bali, Indonesia.

description.zh-cn: 由蒙古族建立的中国朝代。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty established by the Mongols.

description.zh-cn: 元朝将人民分为四个等级的制度。
description.en: A system in the Yuan dynasty that divided the population into four classes.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国户籍制度

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国户籍制度

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的一项户籍管理制度，被一些学者认为与种姓制度有类似之处。
description.en: A household registration system in the People's Republic of China, which some scholars consider to have similarities to a caste system.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国自1978年起推行的一系列经济改革政策。
description.en: A series of economic reform policies implemented in the People's Republic of China since 1978.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛历史上的国家之一。
description.en: One of the historical kingdoms on the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 新罗时期实行的世袭社会等级制度。
description.en: A hereditary social ranking system implemented during the Silla period.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜半岛历史上的一个王朝。
description.en: A dynasty in the history of the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜王朝时期的严密社会等级制度。
description.en: A strict social hierarchy system during the Joseon dynasty.

en: racial segregation in the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国在法律上或社会上强制将非裔美国人与欧裔美国人以及其他少数族裔分开的制度。
description.en: A system of legally or socially enforced separation of African Americans from European Americans and other minority groups in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 指美国黑人或祖先为非洲黑人的美国公民。
description.en: Citizens or residents of the United States who have origins in any of the black populations of Africa.

description.zh-cn: 当代印度的种姓制度基于人称“迦提”的社会组别应运而生。
description.en: The contemporary caste system in India arose based on social groups known as 'Jati'.

description.zh-cn: 当代印度的种姓制度基于理论上的“瓦尔那”应运而生。
description.en: The contemporary caste system in India arose based on the theoretical concept of 'Varna'.

description.zh-cn: 尼泊尔和印度同属于一个文化圈，故前者种姓制度亦相似于后者。
description.en: Nepal and India belong to the same cultural sphere, thus the former's caste system is similar to the latter's.

description.zh-cn: 在其统治期间将尼瓦尔人分成了64个种姓，从而推动了尼泊尔种姓制度的建立与发展。
description.en: During his reign, he divided the Newar people into 64 castes, thus promoting the establishment and development of the Nepalese caste system.

description.zh-cn: 在其统治期间采取了与贾亚斯提提·马拉类似的举动，推动了种姓制度的发展。
description.en: During his reign, he took actions similar to Jayasthiti Malla, promoting the development of the caste system.

description.zh-cn: 在其统治期间在廓尔喀设立了印度的社会制度，推动了种姓制度在当地的建立。
description.en: During his reign, he established the Indian social system in Gorkha, promoting the establishment of the caste system in the region.

description.zh-cn: 出任首相后，尼泊尔正式成为印度教王国，此举巩固并强化了种姓制度。
description.en: After he became Prime Minister, Nepal officially became a Hindu kingdom, which consolidated and strengthened the caste system.

description.zh-cn: 在巴基斯坦，因为受到伊斯兰教的征服和同化，种姓制度的影响力相对印度被弱化。
description.en: In Pakistan, due to the conquest and assimilation by Islam, the influence of the caste system was weakened compared to India.

description.zh-cn: 斯里兰卡的种姓制度受到印度的影响，主要是迦提系统和瓦尔那这两个理论。
description.en: The caste system in Sri Lanka was influenced by India, mainly through the concepts of Jati and Varna.

description.zh-cn: 在柬埔寨、缅甸、泰国等东南亚国家，随着佛教的传入，种姓制度式微并逐渐凋零。
description.en: In Southeast Asian countries such as Cambodia, Myanmar, and Thailand, the caste system declined and gradually disappeared with the introduction of Buddhism.

description.zh-cn: 在印度尼西亚，随着信奉伊斯兰教的阿拉伯商人的涌入，种姓制度逐渐衰亡。
description.en: In Indonesia, the caste system gradually declined with the influx of Arab merchants who practiced Islam.

description.zh-cn: 印度尼西亚巴厘岛的种姓制度确认了四种社会身份，与印度的种姓制度相似。
description.en: The caste system in Bali, Indonesia, recognized four social statuses, similar to the caste system in India.

description.zh-cn: 元朝实行了四等人制，将人民分为四个等级。
description.en: The Yuan dynasty implemented the 'Four-Class System', dividing the population into four classes.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国户籍制度

description.zh-cn: 户籍制度在改革开放之后有所弱化。
description.en: The household registration system (Hukou) has been weakened since the Reform and Opening-up.

description.zh-cn: 新罗时期实行骨品制，将国人分为八个等级。
description.en: During the Silla period, the Bone-rank system was implemented, dividing the people into eight classes.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜王朝时期实行严密的身份制度，将国人分为五个等级。
description.en: During the Joseon dynasty, a strict status system was implemented, dividing the people into five classes.

description.zh-cn: 美国种族隔离制度在法律上或社会上强制将非裔美国人与主流社区分开，限制了其权利与社会融合。
description.en: Racial segregation in the United States legally or socially enforced the separation of African Americans from the mainstream community, restricting their rights and social integration.
